name: SimplyEasierAcordForms
0:
”Alexa, ask Cap Dat Acord”
”Email certificate”
”Certificate policy limits”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cap dat acord
des: Simply Easier Acord Forms skill gives insurance agents the ability to email a certificate of insurance to themselves or to a certificate holder. This skill also provides the ability to get the certificate policy limits.
